title: Core–shell particle formation via Co-assembly of AB diblock copolymers and nanoparticles in 3D soft confinement
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22449-22458
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02223H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Liangjun Ma, Runyu Duan, Ganghui Cao, Hajinuer Bahetihan, Weixin Kong
Core–shell particle formation via co-assembly of AB diblock copolymers and nanoparticles in 3D soft confinement was studied using a simulated annealing method.
